PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-02532015-02-26,  ,  ,  NR, 
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of SUSAN HAYES of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Management of the Canada Revenue Agency, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Gordon David Gillis, effective March 5, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
